profileSummary: Passionate Full Stack Developer specializing in Java Spring Boot, Vue.js, and Generative AI. I love creating innovative solutions that make a difference.

experiences.description: Access management system to assign roles to GE users through approval workflows.
achievements: Gathered and analyzed client requirements
Estimated and modularized business tasks
Developed using Spring Boot and Angular 8
Deployed on Tomcat, handled unit testing and UAT bugs
Managed code commits, releases, and coordination

experiences.description: Travel provided GE users access to cards, news, and travel-related services. Fleet managed vehicle assignment records.
achievements: Analyzed and modularized requirements for Travel & Fleet apps
Built backend with Spring Boot and frontend with Angular 13
Deployed on Tomcat and supported UAT bug fixes
Led team collaboration and task allocation

experiences.description: Standardized tool for placing employee payroll deductions and payment requests.
achievements: Built Spring MVC controllers, services, repositories
Migrated project from Ant to Maven
Converted XML configs to Java-based config
Integrated with third-party APIs
Fixed vulnerabilities and UAT bugs

experiences.description: Monthly billing tool for GE trip expenditures, organized through recurring job batches.
achievements: Built Spring Boot modules and front-end React components
Configured queues and handled interface communication
Migrated project from Spring MVC with JSP to Spring Boot + React
Managed deployment, testing, and bug fixes

experiences.description: A collaborative platform where users can host/join competitions, hire talent, and communicate.
achievements: Built secure APIs, JWT validations, and social login integrations
Created custom Vue.js components and UIs
Handled backend API dev and production support
Manual tested and deployed on Tomcat

experiences.company: Wevio India Info Solutions Pvt Ltd
experiences.description: Customizable safe-selling platform with user-configurable product features and purchasing flow.
achievements: Developed views using JSP, HTML, and Java Beans
Wrote Spring controllers and JPA-based DB logic
Coordinated production deployment and testing
Handled defect fixing and debugging in Dev env

testimonials.quote: Akhil is one of the most dependable and driven professionals I’ve come across. His proactive mindset and attention to detail have made a real impact on our projects.
testimonials.author: Navita, Sr. Consultant at Capgemini

testimonials.quote: Your exceptional problem-solving skills and ability to engage well with the team have made a significant contribution to the success of our projects.
testimonials.author: Siddhartha Malempati, Commons Collective

testimonials.quote: Akhil is a go-getter who adds great value to the team.
testimonials.author: Nithin Reddy Kesari, MD at RUI Labs

testimonials.quote: Akhil is one of the most talented backend developers I've worked with. His strong technical skills, problem-solving mindset, and commitment to quality consistently stand out. He fosters a collaborative and positive work environment.
testimonials.author: Shrutika Kamble, Associate Consultant at Capgemini

testimonials.quote: Akhil consistently demonstrated strong technical expertise in Java and full stack development, playing a key role in driving the Delivery Excellence initiative from start to end. Beyond his technical skills, he stood out for his initiative and leadership — delivering technical sessions to upskill teams and support junior members. He would be a true asset to any team.
testimonials.author: Snehal Kalke, Ex-Manager at Capgemini

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce solution with advanced features like AI-powered recommendations, real-time inventory management, and secure payment processing.

projects.title: AI Chat Assistant
projects.description: An intelligent chatbot powered by OpenAI GPT-3.5, capable of understanding context and providing human-like responses for customer support.
